channel.title: The Work in Progress Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: A conversation about retaining your Christianity while growing up in modern day America.
channel.itunes:author: A Work in Progress
channel.itunes:summary: Pretty much everything about this podcast is a work-in-progress. The host(s), the guests, the format, the website, etc. are all in various states of becoming who God means them to be. In its current form, each episode is a conversation between a father and his oldest daughter. Dad is trying to prepare his girl to hold onto the Faith that was delivered to her as she becomes independent. While daughter tries to help the old guy learn to communicate without offending everyone under 30.
channel.description: Pretty much everything about this podcast is a work-in-progress. The host(s), the guests, the format, the website, etc. are all in various states of becoming who God means them to be. In its current form, each episode is a conversation between a father and his oldest daughter. Dad is trying to prepare his girl to hold onto the Faith that was delivered to her as she becomes independent. While daughter tries to help the old guy learn to communicate without offending everyone under 30.

item.title: LGBT
item.itunes:subtitle: The first Work in Progress Podcast episode
item.itunes:author: Work in Progress Podcast
item.itunes:summary: We both learn how to better communicate the Christian understanding of LGBT issues. Dad learns how to better communicate without giving offense and Daughter learns how easy misperception is.
item.description: We both learn how to better communicate the Christian understanding of LGBT issues. Dad learns how to better communicate without giving offense and Daughter learns how easy misperception is.

item.title: Being Christian
item.itunes:subtitle: What it's like for one Christian in high school
item.itunes:author: Work in Progress Podcast
item.itunes:summary: We discuss how difficult it is to discuss Christianity outside of Church. Daughter talks about how she would get more support coming out as LGBT than coming out as Chritian at her school. Dad tries to learn how to better communicate with young people.
item.description: We discuss how difficult it is to discuss Christianity outside of Church. Daughter talks about how she would get more support coming out as LGBT than coming out as Chritian at her school. Dad tries to learn how to better communicate with young people.

item.title: NYG
item.itunes:subtitle: Experiences at the LCMS National Youth Gathering
item.itunes:author: Work in Progress Podcast
item.itunes:summary: We discuss The LCMS National Youth Gathering. Daughter dicsusses what she learned. Dad tries to understand what Daughter learned versus what was trying to be communicated.
item.description: We discuss The LCMS National Youth Gathering. Daughter dicsusses what she learned. Dad tries to understand what Daughter learned versus what was trying to be communicated.

item.title: Eternal and Long-Term
item.itunes:subtitle: How the lack of concern about the eternal affects talking about God.
item.itunes:author: Work in Progress Podcast
item.itunes:summary: We discuss the idea that youth in general don't think about the long-term. Daughter discusses the impact of social media on what is perceived to be real and how that affects long-term thinking. Dad realizes how much the background of his childhood affected his long-term thinking.
item.description: We discuss the idea that youth in general don't think about the long-term. Daughter discusses the impact of social media on what is perceived to be real and how that affects long-term thinking. Dad realizes how much the background of his childhood affected his long-term thinking.

item.title: Awesome God
item.itunes:subtitle: Analyzing the theology a song conveys.
item.itunes:author: Work in Progress Podcast
item.itunes:summary: Daugther #2 and Dad discuss the theology of the song "Awesome God". Daughter #2 learns how to analyze a song. Dad is a little surprised by how much daughter #2 has absorbed.
item.description: Daugther #2 and Dad discuss the theology of the song "Awesome God". Daughter #2 learns how to analyze a song. Dad is a little surprised by how much daughter #2 has absorbed.

item.title: Youth Bible Study
item.itunes:subtitle: Past and future of Youth Bible Study.
item.itunes:author: Work in Progress Podcast
item.itunes:summary: We discuss what a Sunday morning youth Bible study looks like. Daughter #1 explains how studies have gone in the past and the pitfalls Dad will encounter. Dad learns what areas of the Bible interest the youth.
item.description: We discuss what a Sunday morning youth Bible study looks like. Daughter #1 explains how studies have gone in the past and the pitfalls Dad will encounter. Dad learns what areas of the Bible interest the youth.

item.title: Questions for Dad
item.itunes:subtitle: What if Dad could art?
item.itunes:author: Work in Progress Podcast
item.itunes:summary: We discuss what it would be like if Dad had any artistic ability. Daughter #1 asks how Dad would think if he were an artist. Dad answers an artistic question in a logical fashion as only he would.
item.description: We discuss what it would be like if Dad had any artistic ability. Daughter #1 asks how Dad would think if he were an artist. Dad answers an artistic question in a logical fashion as only he would.

item.title: Race, Principles, and Empathy
item.itunes:subtitle: Communication is hard
item.itunes:author: Work in Progress Podcast
item.itunes:summary: We discuss being Asian and how to communicate principles with empathy. Daughter #1 wins the conversation. Dad learns that GenZ is not unique in its need for individual attention.
item.description: We discuss being Asian and how to communicate principles with empathy. Daughter #1 wins the conversation. Dad learns that GenZ is not unique in its need for individual attention.
